cast.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.
cast.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

cast.original_title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
cast.overview: There is a new criminal mastermind at large (Professor Moriarty) and not only is he Holmes’ intellectual equal, but his capacity for evil and lack of conscience may give him an advantage over the  detective.
cast.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows

details.biography: Laurentiu Possa is a world-wide known artist best loved for his role as Guzmin, in 'Modern Love' (2019) - When the Doorman IS Your Main Man with Cristin Milioti. As Vladimir in 'Killing Eve' (2018) he gave a compelling performance alongside Sarah Oh, Fiona Shaw and Kim Bodnia. Still with his first manager, Suzann Wade, Laurentiu being a linguist has played a myriad of roles, like Russian cop (2007) in Bourne Ultimatum, and a Chechen dissident for BBC Radio 4 in Forty Three, Fifty Nine (2009), the doppelgänger role utilising his Romanian and Spanish language skills (playing Rene and The Spanish Ambassador in Sherlock Holmes - A Game of Shadows (2011)). Fluent in Latin, he enjoys perfecting his Portuguese, Italian, French (as Octavian in Extraordinary Rendition (2007)), Romany and Serbian languages as well as his American accent. In Gaming, Laurentiu is best known for: Total War: Attila - The Black Horse (2013), GoldenEye (2010) and James Bond 007 - Blood Stone (2010). He is a keen gardener, health enthusiast and nothing is too good for his little Gracey - his beloved wide eyed cat.
details.name: Laurentiu Possa
